refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Implemented Interfaces
refsect1.para: GnomeFileEntry implements GtkBuildable, AtkImplementorIface, GtkOrientable and GtkEditable.

refsect1.title: Properties
refsect1.synopsis: "browse-dialog-title" gchar* : Read / Write "default-path" gchar* : Read / Write "directory-entry" gboolean : Read / Write "filechooser-action" GtkFileChooserAction : Read / Write "filename" gchar* : Read / Write "gnome-entry" GnomeEntry* : Read "gtk-entry" GtkEntry* : Read "history-id" gchar* : Read / Write "modal" gboolean : Read / Write "use-filechooser" gboolean : Read / Write

warning.para: GnomeFileEntry is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_new ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_new is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Creates a new GnomeFileEntry widget.

listitem.simpara: the id given to gnome_entry_new (see GnomeEntry).
Title for the file dialog window.
A pointer to the widget, NULL if it cannot be created.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_construct ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_construct is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Constructs a GnomeFileEntry

listitem.simpara: A GnomeFileEntry to construct.
the id given to gnome_entry_new (see GnomeEntry).
Title for the file dialog window.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_gnome_entry ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_gnome_entry is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: It returns a pointer to the gnome entry widget of the widget (seeGnomeEntry).

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
A pointer to the component GnomeEntry widget

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_gtk_entry ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_gtk_entry is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Similar to gnome_file_entry_gnome_entry but returns the gtk entry instead of the Gnome entry widget.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
Returns the GtkEntry widget

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_set_title ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_set_title is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the title of the browse dialog to browse_dialog_title. The new title will go into effect the next time the browse button is pressed.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
The new title for the file browse dialog window.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_set_default_path ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_set_default_path is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Set the default path of browse dialog to path. The default path is only used if the entry is empty or if the current path of the entry is not an absolute path, in which case the default path is prepended to it before the dialog is started.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
A path string.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_set_directory_entry ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_set_directory_entry is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets whether this is a directory only entry. If directory_entry is true, then gnome_file_entry_get_full_path will check for the file being a directory, and the browse dialog will have the file list disabled.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
boolean

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_get_directory_entry ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_get_directory_entry is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets whether this is a directory only entry. See also gnome_file_entry_set_directory_entry.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
A boolean.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_get_full_path ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_get_full_path is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Gets the full absolute path of the file from the entry. If file_must_exist is false, nothing is tested and the path is returned. If file_must_exist is true, then the path is only returned if the path actually exists. In case the entry is a directory entry (see gnome_file_entry_set_directory_entry), then if the path exists and is a directory then it's returned; if not, it is assumed it was a file so we try to strip it, and try again. It allocates memory for the returned string.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
boolean
a newly allocated string with the path or NULL if something went wrong

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_set_filename ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_set_filename is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the internal entry to this string.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_set_modal ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_set_modal is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Sets the modality of the browse dialog.

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
true if the window is to be modal, false otherwise.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_get_modal ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_get_modal is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: This function gets the boolean which specifies if the browsing dialog is modal or not

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
A boolean.

refsect2.title: gnome_file_entry_set_directory ()

warning.para: gnome_file_entry_set_directory is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.para: Deprecated, use gnome_file_entry_set_directory_entry

listitem.simpara: The GnomeFileEntry widget to work with.
boolean

refsect2.title: The "browse-dialog-title" property
refsect2.para: Title for the Browse file dialog.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "default-path" property
refsect2.para: Default path for the Browse file window.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "directory-entry" property
refsect2.para: Whether the file entry is being used to enter directory names or complete filenames.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "filechooser-action" property
refsect2.para: The type of operation that the file selector is performing.
Default value: GTK_FILE_CHOOSER_ACTION_OPEN

refsect2.title: The "filename" property
refsect2.para: Filename that should be displayed in the file entry.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "gnome-entry" property
refsect2.para: GnomeEntry that the file entry uses for entering filenames. You can use this property to get the GnomeEntry if you need to modify or query any of its parameters.

refsect2.title: The "gtk-entry" property
refsect2.para: GtkEntry that the file entry uses for entering filenames. You can use this property to get the GtkEntry if you need to modify or query any of its parameters.

refsect2.title: The "history-id" property
refsect2.para: Unique identifier for the file entry. This will be used to save the history list.
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The "modal" property
refsect2.para: Whether the Browse file window should be modal.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "use-filechooser" property
refsect2.para: Whether to use the new GtkFileChooser widget or the GtkFileSelection widget to select files.
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The "activate" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (GnomeFileEntry *fileentry, gpointer user_data) : Run Last

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "browse-clicked" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (GnomeFileEntry *fileentry, gpointer user_data) : Run Last

listitem.simpara: the object which received the signal.
user data set when the signal handler was connected.
